About Me

About Me

My name is Dayal Chand Aichara. I am from Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. I work as a Data Scientist in Tokyo, Japan. I have completed Master of Technology in Geoinformatics from Centre of Studies in Resources Engineering , IIT Bombay in 2018.

I love to play basketball. I like to do hiking, trekking, and outdoor activities. I also write articles on Medium.

Projects

  • c0ban insight wrapper
    • c0banAPI is a python library which request c0ban blockchain insight api to get blocks and transactions related data
  • PriceIndices.
    • This python library can be used to get historical price data of cryptocurrencies from CoinMarketCap, and calculate & plot different technical price indicators.
